text: Fate has us meet from a thousand miles away.

in_chinese: 握住你的手，和你一起变老。
pin_yin: wò zhù nǐ de shǒu, hé nǐ yīqǐ biàn lǎo
text: Hold your hand and grow old with you.
In the eyes of a lover, Xi Shi appears.

in_chinese: 有情饮水饱，无情食饭饥。
pin_yin: yǒuqíng yǐnshuǐ bǎo, wúqíng shí fàn jī
text: Having love, drinking water will fill you up, without love, eating food will leave you hungry.
Love the house with its crows (on the roof).
One day (seems like) three autumns.
Lifting the tray up to the eyebrows.

in_chinese: 生活有爱幸福,为爱生活愚蠢。
pin_yin: shēnghuó yǒu ài xìngfú, wèi ài shēnghuó yúchǔn
text: Living with love is happy, but living for love is foolish.
People in love will get married.
Love won’t let go of hand.
A smile is the best remedy.

pin_yin: bú pà màn, jiù pà tíng.
text: Don’t be afraid of going slow, just be afraid of stopping/standing still.

in_chinese: 授人以鱼不如授人以渔。
pin_yin: shòu rén yǐ yú bù rú shòu rén yǐ yú
text: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man how to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

pin_yin: chī yī qiàn, zhǎng yī zhì
text: Eat one pit/moat, grow one wisdom.
Water flows in to flow out.

in_chinese: 留得青山在，不怕没柴烧。
pin_yin: liú dé qīngshān zài, bùpà méi chái shāo
text: While there are green hills, there will be wood to burn.

in_chinese: 请教别人一次是五分钟的傻子，从不请教别人是一辈子的傻子。
pin_yin: qǐngjiào biérén yīcì shì wǔ fēnzhōng de shǎzi, cóng bù qǐngjiào biérén shì yībèizi de shǎzi
text: He who asks a question might be a fool for five minutes; he who doesn’t ask a question remains a fool forever.

in_chinese: 一鸟在手胜过双鸟在林。
pin_yin: yī niǎo zài shǒu shèngguò shuāng niǎo zài lín
text: One bird in the hand is better than two birds in a forest.

in_chinese: 千军易得, 一将难求。
pin_yin: qiān jūn yì dé, yī jiāng nán qiú
text: It’s easy to find a thousand troops, but a general is hard to find.
The heroes think the same.
If the family lives in harmony, all affairs will prosper.

in_chinese: 儿行千里母担忧。 (ér xíng qiānlǐ mǔ dānyōu) – “When children go far
text: When children go far (lit. thousand li/500 km), mothers worry.

pin_yin: jiā jiā yǒu běn nán niàn de jīnɡ
text: Every family has its own issues.

pin_yin: yǒu qí fù bì yǒu qí zi
text: Where there is a father, there is a son.
Family’s shames can’t be taken outside/be visible.
Fallen leaves return to their roots.

in_chinese: 金窝，银窝，不如自家的狗窝。
pin_yin: jīn wō, yín wō, bùrú zìjiā de gǒu wō
text: A poor man treasures his shack more than gold and silver mansions.
Children and grandchildren will have their own children and grandchildren.
If you don’t manage a household, you wouldn’t know how expensive it is.

pin_yin: jiā yǒu bì zhǒu, xiǎng zhī qiānjīn
text: Cherish a broom as if it was gold.
Everything starts hard.
Practice makes perfect.

pin_yin: bīngdòng sān chǐ, fēi yī rì zhī hán
text: Freezing into three feet depth can’t be done in one day.

in_chinese: 三个臭皮匠，胜过诸葛亮。 (sān gè chòu píjiàng, shèngguò zhūgéliàng) – “Three unskilled
pin_yin: sān gè chòu píjiàng, shèngguò zhūgéliàng
text: Three unskilled (“smelly”) cobblers are better than one Zhuge Liang.
Today’s tasks are to be completed today.

in_chinese: 师父领进门，修行在个人。
pin_yin: shīfu lǐng jìnmén, xiūxíng zài gèrén
text: Teachers open the doors, but you enter by yourself.
To want to get fat with only one bite.
Haste is not enough.
Hearing a hundred times doesn’t compare to seeing once.

pin_yin: bù rù hǔxué, yān dé hǔ zi*
text: You cannot catch tiger cubs without entering the tiger’s lair.

pin_yin: luóbo qīngcài, gè yǒu suǒ ài
text: Each turnip loves something different.
A fast foot arrives first.
Spilt water can’t be gathered up.

in_chinese: 凡人不可貌相, 海水不可斗量。
pin_yin: fánrén bùkě màoxiàng, hǎishuǐ bùkě dǒu liàng
text: Mortals are not to be judged by appearance, and the sea is not to be measured.
Wherever you are, follow local customs.
When you have a lot of friends, you don’t have any real friends.
Those with the same illness commiserate with each other.

pin_yin: shàn yǒu shàn bào, è yǒu è bào
text: The good deeds pay good recompense and the evil pays back with evil.
As you sow a melon, you should reap one.

pin_yin: yī rì zhī jì zàiyú chén
text: The plan of the day should be done in the morning/dawn.

in_chinese: 用一个筷子吃饭的人是饿的。
pin_yin: yòng yīgè kuàizi chīfàn de rén shì è de
text: Those who eat with one chopstick will stay hungry.

in_chinese: 一个在床上吃饼干的男人醒来感觉很糟糕。
pin_yin: yīgè zài chuángshàng chī bǐnggān de nánrén xǐng lái gǎnjué hěn zāogāo
text: A man who eats biscuits in his bed wakes up feeling terrible.

in_chinese: 一个男人在电栅栏上小便将会得到令人震惊的消息。
pin_yin: yīgè nánrén zài diàn zhàlán shàng xiǎobiàn jiāng huì dédào lìng rén zhènjīng de xiāoxī
text: A man urinating on an electric fence will get shocking news.
To climb a tree to catch fish.
To beat/slap a horse’s back.
